v0.9.1.1 - Critical Crash Fix
[CRITICAL FIX] - Fixed crash on first battle completion (MenuHelper.CheckEnemyAttackableHonorably race condition) - Battle cleanup now properly deferred to prevent menu rendering corruption - Enhanced diagnostic logging for future stability tracking
---
v0.9.1 - Major Systems Overhaul & Critical Fixes
[CRITICAL FIXES] - Fixed promotion state resetting on re-enlistment - Promotions now persist correctly between service periods - Fixed item confiscation crash during baggage checks - Added comprehensive null safety - Fixed ghost condition bug - Medical conditions now properly clear when expired - Fixed baggage check inventory bugs - Items now properly removed when stowed/sold - Multi-factor promotion requirements display in muster with progress indicators
[NEW: SKILL-BASED BAGGAGE STOWAGE] - Contraband system removed - Replaced with skill-based first-time storage event - 4 diplomatic options: Charm (free), Trade (-50% fee), Roguery (intimidate, -25% fee) - Sell All option (60% liquidation) or Abort (cancel enlistment) - All options result in standard baggage storage with varying costs/reputation effects - Simpler, more player-friendly approach to starting gear
[BAGGAGE TRAIN OVERHAUL] - World-state-aware simulation: event probabilities adapt to campaign situation - Dynamic decision system: baggage access appears in Decisions accordion when available - Intelligent availability: accessible in towns/camps when stationary, locked during combat/sieges/pursuits - Adaptive event chances: 40% catch-up in garrison vs 10% during intense combat operations - War stance affects raids: +12% raid chance when lord is desperate - Terrain affects delays: +10% mountains, +15% snow - Baggage status integrated into Camp Hub Company Status and Main Menu Company Reports - Separate from 3-opportunity daily limit - Logistics decisions shown independently
[COMPANY NEEDS CONSOLIDATION] - Merged Equipment metric into Supplies (5 metrics → 4 metrics) - New unified Supplies metric covers food, ammunition, maintenance materials, and logistics - Simplified company status tracking with clearer cause/effect relationships - All documentation updated to reflect 4-metric system
[ENCOUNTER SAFETY IMPROVEMENTS] - Added captivity conversation suppression - Prevents native capture dialogues from interfering - Added encounter capture suppression - Blocks unwanted prisoner management screens - Added naval navigation capability patch for sea travel - Improved encounter guard with better state detection and auto-cleanup - Enhanced logging for encounter decisions and menu transitions
[STATUS TEXT CLARITY] - Replaced vague activity hints with clear military context descriptions - "Something's in the air" → "The company is on the move. Stay sharp for duty calls" - Medical warnings now explicitly mention brewing illness with severity levels - Day phase routine text converted to factual descriptions - Added 15 new localization strings for activity forecasts and medical warnings
[MENU STRUCTURE CLEANUP] - Removed dead code: obsolete Reports menu functions (186 lines removed) - Increased decision slots from 3 to 5 to accommodate opportunities + logistics - Streamlined menu transitions and state management - Updated all documentation to reflect current menu structure
[TECHNICAL IMPROVEMENTS] - Major code quality improvements (500+ Qodana issues resolved) - Enhanced diagnostic logging with level guidelines (Info/Debug/Warn/Error) - Added new logging categories: Naval, SiegeIntegration, BattleIntegration, CaptivityStatus - Improved item comparison using StringId instead of reference equality - Comprehensive documentation updates (BLUEPRINT.md, reference guides) - Added reference docs for battle, captivity, menu, and party attachment systems
[DOCUMENTATION] - Complete camp life simulation documentation update - New reference guides: battle system analysis, captivity & raids, complete menu analysis - Updated logging guidelines with real-world examples - Comprehensive baggage train integration documentation
This major update streamlines core systems, removes player frustration points (contraband), consolidates company metrics for clarity, and significantly improves encounter safety and menu flow.
